name: Space Mission (sethedens)
description:
Space Mission is a top-down space maze designed in Perenspiel using Java script. The game was created as a school project and has three addicting levels that get progressively more difficult. Do you have the timing and reflexes to dodge the alien ships and collect all the stars?

*Best played fullscreen. When in fullscreen mode click anywhere on the gray background to enable controls. WASD
